price: Ya ce: "Ku sauka, sãshenku zuwa ga sãshe yanã maƙiyi, kuma kunã da matabbata a cikin ƙasa, da ɗan jin dãɗi zuwa ga wani lõkabi."
arabic: قَالَ ٱهۡبِطُواْ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوّٞۖ وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُسۡتَقَرّٞ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla ih'biṭū baʿḍukum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun walakum fī al-arḍi mus'taqarrun wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
